description:
Questions: How do you get started online? How do you build a web business? How do you start making money online for a tiny investment?

Answer: Build your own website and immediately publish valuable content.

And, you know what’s really amazing? You can do that – I mean all of that – in just 5 minutes.

In order to build your own website you need two things:

  • a domain name (you need to register your www something dot com)
  • and web hosting (you need to get a physical server to host your website's files)

In this course I'll show you how to do that easily and for less than $4 a month. I recommend good quality web hosts and domain name registrars but can do this course with any web host and domain name registrar you choose.

WordPress is free, open source software that powers 20-25% of the world’s websites. You can use it to set up a one page website as well as an incredibly complex, busy website with thousands of pages and a shop.

I show you how to set up WordPress in seconds and provide you with a content management system that will be able to handle anything you can throw at it.

And we do it the right way – so it is optimized for search engines.

Sure, WordPress has a learning curve to it. But that’s really no excuse. It is very easy to build your own website, create content and set up a business that will support the lifestyle you want into the future – if you take this course!

And you can start now! This is the course that will enthuse you into taking action. As soon as you set up WordPress you can start creating content and start building an online business and brand.

You can do it!
title: Set Up WordPress And Blog: A Crash Course In Web Publishing
